title: Good Morning Guardian! - Novel Updates
tags: Angels   Fantasy World   Firearms   God-human Relationship   Gods   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Magical Technology   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   R-15   Special Abilities   Wars
author: Miku   美紅
description:
Several years have passed since the ties between Mankind and Gods broke.
Although the battle against the Gods still continues until now, humanity has certainly continue developed.
Meanwhile, a young man awoke in an isolated Island――.>
